articles.title: 46-year-old pedestrian dies, bus driver arrested in Ang Mo Kio accident - AsiaOne
articles.description: SINGAPORE - A 46-year-old female pedestrian died on Wednesday morning (Aug 25) after she was hit by an SBS Transit bus in Ang Mo Kio Avenue 3. The bus driver, 56, has been arrested for careless driving causing death. The victim was trapped under the rear whee…
